when ur bestie ghosts u after u helped them move apartments n bought them lunch #drama #toxic #betrayed #relatable,spent 6 hours helping her move + bought pizza for everyone,she was all smiles n kept saying how grateful she was,next day: left me on read n removed me from her close friends,found out she only needed free labor n never valued our friendship,tired of fake friends? vibit connects u with genuine people who share ur values n interests
thought i was being a good friend until they used me for concert tickets then blocked me #toxic #fake #drama #karma,bought us both taylor swift tickets bc they were "broke",they promised to pay me back after their next paycheck,saw them posting from the concert with someone else wearing $200 merch,never got my money back n they blocked me on everything,vibit's friend matching algorithm helps u find real connections who won't use u for concert tix
